availableBikestationNumber: Bikes available at the station right now :
bannerParagraph: The new city bike season has started. Registration and season passes are now available!
buyPassParagraph1: The city bike season starts on 1 April and ends on 31 October.
buyPassParagraph2: Please note that the bike system in place in Helsinki and Espoo is different from the system used in Vantaa and you cannot mix bikes from the two systems.
buyPassParagraph3: The pass for the whole season for Helsinki and Espoo costs EUR 35, for Vantaa EUR 30
TicketsParagraph1: Welcome to use city bikes. Find the closest available bike and hop on! The bikes are available from the beginning of April until the end of October.
TicketsParagraph2: All city bike stations will not necessarily be in use at the start of the season.The bike stations are installed as soon as the snow has melted.
TicketsPricetext-0: Until 31 October 2023, unlimited number of up to 30-minute rides, 1 bike
TicketsPricetext-1: Today + 6 days, unlimited number of up to 30-minute rides, 1 bike
TicketsPricetext-2: 24h, unlimited number of up to 30-minute rides, 1-4 bikes, €5/bike
TicketsPriceext-3: Unlimited number of 30-minute journeys for 30 days. The subscription is valid until further notice.
